mapper.select: SELECT employee_id, password, name, dept_no, position_no, cell_phone, email, address, TO_CHAR(hire_date,'YY/MM/DD ') AS hire_date, birth_day, holiday, img_code FROM employee WHERE employee_id like '%' || #{employee_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}|| '%'
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET password = #{password}, dept_no = #{dept_no}, position_no = #{position_no}, cell_phone = #{cell_phone}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, holiday = #{holiday}, img_code = #{img_code} WHERE employee_id = #{employee_id}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employee ( employee_id, password, name, dept_no, position_no, cell_phone, email, address, hire_date, birth_day, holiday, img_code ) VALUES ( #{employee_id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{dept_no}, #{position_no}, #{cell_phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{hire_date}, #{birth_day}, #{holiday}, #{img_code} )
